You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesJ J] > &jfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Jfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D50D.
  * `&jfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D527.
